Lists Progbot's commands
Ask for help and rulings
Get an invite link!
Normal: 5d6>4 or N5; Comment: #, Keep high/low: 2d6h1/2d6l1, Explode: 5d6!6 (opt: repeat X times)
Lookup BattleChips
Lookup Powers (Navi or Virus)
Lookup NCPs

Lookup a category of chips or NCPs! (Can also list bond powers, daemons, network mods, weather)

Spend/add Jeers (1: random one, 2: pick one, 5: pick a MegaJeer)

Generate a randomized Navi boss fight prompt!

Sets a random timer for GMs to cycle out fish. The maximum random time is 10 minutes.
Test ProgBot's randomness! (256 is normal, 200+ is good!)
